channel.title: WHonix Script Error
channel.description:
I got this today in 2 of my Whonx VMs. sys-whonix being one of them. It said to report is so here I am. Do I need to do anything. I restarted my computer. > > ############################################################################### > ## whonixcheck script bug. > ## No panic. Nothing is broken. Just some rare condition has been hit. > ## Try again later. There is likely a solution for this problem. > ## Please see Whonix News, Whonix Blog and Whonix User Help Forum. > ## Please report this bug! > ## > ## who_ami: user > ## identifier: > ## exit_code: 1 > ## error_cause: error_handler signal ERR detected with BASH_COMMAND: TEMP_DIR="$(mktemp --directory)" > ## > ## Experts only: > ## bash -x whonixcheck --verbose > ## for verbose output. Clean the output and report to Whonix developers. > #########################################################################
**EDIT**: This might be a Qubes OS issue. Not sure though. If you know much about Qubes and can help I made another forum request here: https://groups.google.com/d/msg/qubes-users/PhsdyoyjDnw/HCIH1M-yBwAJ
Otherwise post here.

item.title: WHonix Script Error
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi shorty123

Based on the error output I donâ€™t think this is a Qubes bug. Are you having any problems? Are you able to connect to Tor?

Could you please run in sys-whonix konsole.

whonixcheck --verbose

Many times errors have already been reported in older threads and can be found by using the forum search engine (upper right hand corner of your screen). Using the error message for search criteria produces these results which may have a solution or point you in the right direction.

https://forums.whonix.org/search?expanded=true&q=No%20panic.%20Nothing%20is%20broken.%20Just%20some%20rare%20condition%20has%20been%20hit.

Read full topic

item.title: WHonix Script Error
item.dc:creator: shorty123
item.description:
I got this today in 2 of my Whonx VMs. sys-whonix being one of them. It said to report is so here I am. Do I need to do anything. I restarted my computer.

###############################################################################

whonixcheck script bug.

No panic. Nothing is broken. Just some rare condition has been hit.

Try again later. There is likely a solution for this problem.

Please see Whonix News, Whonix Blog and Whonix User Help Forum.

Please report this bug!

who_ami: user

identifier:

exit_code: 1

error_cause: error_handler signal ERR detected with BASH_COMMAND: TEMP_DIR="$(mktemp --directory)"

Experts only:

bash -x whonixcheck --verbose

for verbose output. Clean the output and report to Whonix developers.

#########################################################################

EDIT: This might be a Qubes OS issue. Not sure though. If you know much about Qubes and can help I made another forum request here: https://groups.google.com/d/msg/qubes-users/PhsdyoyjDnw/HCIH1M-yBwAJ

Otherwise post here.

Read full topic
